April 29, 2017 D Oslo Brassfestival (Third Division)
Oslo Brassfestival (Third Division) 30 Other Oslo Brassfestival oslo-brassfestival-third-division
None
Gamle Museet, Oslo, Oslo County, Norway Third Section introduced.
Adjudicators Saturday: David Strøm (gruppepris: kornett, horn), Morten Fagerjord (gruppepris: slagverk, trombone), Jan Arne Stavik Karlsen (gruppepris: tuba, euph/bar)
Best Cornet, Best Horn & Audience 'Music Police' Prize: Fræna Musikkorps Best Euph/Bari: BrassiMo Best Trombone: Riska Brass Band Best Tuba: Eidsberg Brassband Best Percussion: Sørkedalen Brass Best Instrumentalist: Jack Royle
